abstract: Photographer Miguel Winograd, student at International Center of Photography, has spent much of 2015 capturing the daily lives of butchers across New York City.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Winograd photographed workers at 16 meat markets across the city, finding a diverse group of people drawn to the craft.
snippet: Miguel Winograd photographed workers at 16 meat markets across the city, finding a diverse group of people drawn to the craft.
